testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete the holiday information with the specified id number via the API connection.
testcase.name: It should be verified via the API that the holiday record to be deleted has been successfully deleted.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/holidayDetails" path parameters....................passed * The api user prepares a GET request body to send to the api holidayDetails endpoint containing the information 169..passed * The api user sends a GET request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '404' with the reason phrase Not Found..passed
